author: Kristína Kučerková
comment: I have purchased full version, but I am still able to see only first page of documents. I got receipt and also in app when I try to purchase it again it gives me the message: Error: You already own this item. For this reason only 1* now.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi, this is a known Google issue and normally a simple restart of your smartwatch solves the problem. If you need further assistance please do not hesitate to contact our support via support@appfour.com.

comment: Please insert search options.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Radu, please contact support@appfour.com for help or refund. We would like to learn more about your issues!

author: Shivaji Doke
comment: PowerPoint presentations not opening up on android wear

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi, we do not support MS files at this point.

author: Jason Leach
comment: Works great for me. Reads all my files on my phone when I need them. Great work

author: Glen Etherington
comment: Slow and fiddly
Not independent of phone. Completely useless.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: To have it working as a standalone app, it is important to install it directly to your smartwatch and chose "standalone" during the installation. If you use it in combination with a mobile device, both watch and phone need to have access to the internet to get access to the files on phone. support@appfour.com will be there to assist your further.

author: Ashish Bhardwaj
comment: What do you mean by standalone support and which app needs to be installed for your application to work independently of my phone ??

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: You can use it without your phone, if you run Android Wear 2.0 and install the app directly from the Play Store on your Smartwatch. During the installation process make sure to chose "standalone".
